div.pre: 2121 Manfria, 10 km. NW of Gela, 1948 Burial: 390-80 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 48+ AR Rhegium: 1 tetradr. (Apollo hd.) Gela: 3 tetradr. (to Jenkins 457) 1 didr. Leontini: 3 tetradr. Messana: 3 tetradr.; 1 didr. Syracuse: 14 decadr. (Euainetos type, earlier issues) 3 tetradr. Athens: 18 tetradr. (incl. 8 4th cent. types) Unc.: 1 didr. Disposition: Gela Griffo, Numismatica 1948, p. 136; AIIN 1955, pp. 200-1; 1958-9, p. 245 Jenkins, Gela, p. 153 Some reports speak of as many as 90 decadr., including those of Cimon
